description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing global application state, including team info, quiz data, saved recommendations, and user feedback, with various setter functions exposing a public interface.

methods.name: setTeam
methods.description: Updates the team object in the global state with new team data.

methods.name: setQuiz
methods.description: Updates the quiz data in the global state with new quiz data.

methods.name: saveRecommendation
methods.description: Adds a new recommendation item to the saved list if it's not already present.

methods.name: giveFeedback
methods.description: Appends a new feedback entry with a timestamp and random suffix to the feedback list.

methods.name: clearRecommendations
methods.description: Clears the saved recommendations; currently sets an empty object as placeholder.
